ContentTaxonomyTermRelatedTerm.name: ContentTaxonomyTermRelatedTerm
ContentTaxonomyTermRelatedTerm.description: Represents the relationship between two terms in a content taxonomy.

ContentTaxonomyId.description: The ID of the content taxonomy to which the term belongs.

ContentTaxonomyTermId.description: The ID of the primary term that has a relationship with another term.

ContentTaxonomyTrmRelaTypeId.description: The ID of the type of relationship between the two taxonomy terms.

RelatedContentTaxonomyTermId.description: The ID of the term that is related to the primary term.
